


select RECID,STAMP,THREAD#,SEQUENCE#,FIRST_CHANGE#,FIRST_TIME,NEXT_CHANGE# 
from RC_LOG_HISTORY where 
trunc(FIRST_TIME)=to_date('31/10/2010','dd/mm/yyyy')
and DB_NAME='PRD2'


     RECID      STAMP    THREAD#  SEQUENCE# FIRST_CHANGE# FIRST_TIME          NEXT_CHANGE#
